short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Turns selected text into mocking sarcastic text inspired by the mocking Spongebob meme.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Introducing the Mocking Text Generator, a fun and easy-to-use Chrome extension that turns your selected text into mocking sarcastic text based on the well-known Spongebob meme. Whether you want to add some humor to your conversations or simply enjoy the quirky text style, this extension is perfect for you.

Features:

- Quick and simple: With just a right-click, instantly convert your selected text into mocking text.
- Clipboard ready: The generated mocking text is automatically copied to your clipboard, so you can easily paste it into your conversations, social media posts, or anywhere you like.
- Context menu integration: Seamlessly integrates with the context menu, making it accessible and user-friendly.

How to use:

1. Install the Mocking Text Generator extension from the Chrome Web Store.
2. Select any text on a web page that you want to convert into mocking text.
3. Right-click the selected text and choose "Generate Mocking Text" from the context menu.
4. The mocking text will be copied to your clipboard, and an alert will display the generated mocking text.
5. Paste the mocking text wherever you want and enjoy the fun!

Inject some humor and lightheartedness into your daily online interactions with the Mocking Text Generator. Add it to your Chrome browser now, and start generating mocking text effortlessly!
